text: Shri Thanedar (born February 22, 1955) is an American businessman, author, and politician. He has been the U.S. representative from Michigan's 13th congressional district since 2023. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Thanedar was a member of the Michigan House of Representatives from 2021 to 2023. He was also a candidate in the Democratic primary for Governor of Michigan in the 2018 election. ==References== ==Other websites== * Personal website * Congressman Shri Thanedar official U.S. House website * Shri Thanedar for Congress campaign website * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Businesspeople from Detroit Category:Writers from Detroit Category:Politicians from Karnataka Category:Writers from Karnataka Category:American autobiographers
title: Shri Thanedar
